  <span class="la">German</span>
  <span class="ff">liegen</span>, from an 
  <span class="la">Indo-European</span>root shared by 
  <span class="la">Greek</span>
  <span class="ff">lektron</span>,
  <span class="ff">lekhos</span>and 
  <span class="la">Latin</span>
  <span class="ff">lectus</span>
  <span class="trans">
  <span tag="tr" class="gp">‘</span>bed
  <span tag="tr" class="gp">’</span></span>
  <span tag="etym" class="gp">.</span>
  <span tag="etym" class="gp"></span></span>
  <span class="note">
  <span tag="note" ty="label" class="gp">usage:</span>The verb 
  <span class="bold">lie</span>is often confused with the verb 
  <span class="bold">lay</span>, giving rise to incorrect uses such as 
  <span class="eg">
    <span d:priority="2" class="ex">he is 
    <span class="bold">laying</span>on the bed</span>
  </span>(correct use is 
  <span class="eg">
    <span d:priority="2" class="ex">he is 
    <span class="bold">lying</span>on the bed</span>
  </span>) or 
  <span class="eg">
    <span d:priority="2" class="ex">why don't you 
    <span class="bold">lie</span>it on the bed?</span>
  </span>(correct use is 
  <span class="eg">
    <span d:priority="2" class="ex">why don't you 
    <span class="bold">lay</span>it on the bed?</span>
  </span>). 
  <span class="xrg">See 
  <span status="unchecked" targetid="DWS-013027" homograph="1" class="xr">
  <span class="xrlabelGroup">
    <span class="xrlabel">usage</span>
  </span>
  <span tag="xr" class="gp">at</span>lay
  <span tag="xr" ty="hom" class="gp">1</span>
  <span class="xrlabelGroup">
    <span class="xrlabel" />
  </span></span></span>
  <span tag="note" class="gp">.</span></span>
</d:entry>
}}}

        </span>
        <span class="eg">

      <span lexid="m_en_gb0469360.006" type="core" class="msDict">
        <span class="df">serve to show that (something previously assumed to be the case) is not true
        <span tag="df" class="gp">:</span>

          <span d:priority="2" tag="eg" class="gp">.</span>
        </span>
      </span>
      <span tag="subEntry" class="gp"></span>
    </span>
    <span id="m_en_gb0469360_1" lexid="m_en_gb0469360.010" class="subEntry">

    <span id="m_en_gb0469360_2" lexid="m_en_gb0469360.011" class="subEntry">

        </span>

        <span tag="df" class="gp">.</span></span>

  </span>

</d:entry>

            <span tag="gg" class="gp">]</span>
            <span tag="gg" class="gp"></span>
          </span>
          <span class="df">the property possessed by an object of producing different sensations on the eye as a result of the way it reflects or emits light
          <span tag="df" class="gp">:</span>
          <span tag="df" class="gp"></span></span>
          <span class="eg">

            <span tag="gg" class="gp">]</span>
            <span tag="gg" class="gp"></span>

          <span tag="df" class="gp">:</span>
